# [Interview #211: Robert Jordan's Blog: ONE MORE TIME, Entry #20](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=211#20)

#### Robert Jordan

For son o'merc, I doubt I'll ever do any short stories, but who knows? Never say never.
